entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
